name: Ext_R5_RequestOrchestration_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RequestOrchestration.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestOrchestration.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who the request orchestration is about
element.definition: The subject for which the request orchestration was created.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.subject` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/HealthcareService)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Location)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Practitioner)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
